> Other than general comments on RESTfullness, would you produce DTDs or
schemas
> for the XML documents? (yeah, XML is not a requirement of REST, it's just
a
> useful convention) Would you output more useful error documents instead of
> just e.g. "406 'query' parameter can't be null"?

I haven't had a chance to look at the rest of it, but I believe you are
using the 406 response incorrectly.  This is reserved to responding to
unrecognized Accept headers.  I suspect that 400 (bad request) would be a
better response here.
